meanings.definition: To surpass in the sense of smell.
meanings.sent1: The dog was outsmelling all the other animals in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The flowers in the garden were outsmelling the nearby bakery.
meanings.sent3: The skunk thought it was outsmelling everyone, but the bear disagreed.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of fresh bread outsmelling the noise of the city streets.
meanings.sent5: The chef's signature dish outsmelling all other dishes on the menu.

meanings.definition: To emit a stronger or more pleasant odor than something else.
meanings.sent1: The bakery was outsmelling the coffee shop down the street.
meanings.sent2: Her perfume was outsmelling all the others in the room.
meanings.sent3: The garbage can was outsmelling the flowers in the garden, much to everyone's dismay.
meanings.sent4: The scent of fresh cookies outsmelling the usual kitchen smells.
meanings.sent5: The blooming roses outsmelling the entire garden with their sweet fragrance.
